CosmereResources.Defs.MetalDef.Name: Cosmere_Metal_Bendalloy
CosmereResources.Defs.MetalDef.label: bendalloy
CosmereResources.Defs.MetalDef.description: Bendalloy is a mysterious and dynamic alloy created by precisely combining cadmium, zinc, and silver. Its shifting hues and volatile properties make it a material of both scientific intrigue and advanced technological potential.
